Sentencas: 3D microstructure-performance relationships in Ni-YSZ anodes for electrolyte-supported cells are investigated in terms of the correlation between the triple phase boundary (TPB) length and polarization resistance (R-pol).
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: Three different Ni-YSZ anodes of varying microstructure are subjected to eight reduction-oxidation (redox) cycles at 950 degrees C.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: In general the TPB lengths correlate with anode performance.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: However, the quantitative results also show that there is no simplistic relationship between TPB and R-pol.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The degradation mechanism strongly depends on the initial microstructure.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: Finer microstructures exhibit lower degradation rates of TPB and R-pol.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: In fine microstructures, TPB loss is found to be due to Ni coarsening, while in coarse microstructures reduction of active TPB results mainly from loss of YSZ percolation.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The latter is attributed to weak bottlenecks associated with lower sintering activity of the coarse YSZ.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The coarse anode suffers from complete loss of YSZ connectivity and associated drop of TPBactive by 93%.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: Surprisingly, this severe microstructure degradation did not lead to electrochemical failure.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: Mechanistic scenarios are discussed for different anode microstructures.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: These scenarios are based on a model for coupled charge transfer and transport, which allows using TPB and effective properties as input.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The mechanistic scenarios describe the microstructure influence on current distributions, which explains the observed complex relationship between TPB lengths and anode performances.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The observed loss of YSZ percolation in the coarse anode is not detrimental because the electrochemical activity is concentrated in a narrow active layer.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance

Sentencas: The anode performance can be predicted reliably if the volume-averaged properties (TPBactive, effective ionic conductivity) are corrected for the so-called short-range effect, which is particularly important in cases with a narrow active layer.
Titulo: 3D Microstructure Effects in Ni-YSZ Anodes: Influence of TPB Lengths on the Electrochemical Performance
